titles: A proclamacion set furthe by the kynges maiestie, wyth the aduise  of his most honorable privey counsail, the xviii. day of July, in the v. yere of his graces most prosperous reigne, against suche as slaunderously whisper and spread abrode false rumours of the further abacing of the coyne.
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1547-1553 : Edward VI)
Edward VI, King of England, 1537-1553.
notes: Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
